S04n509:1: tatra kumāra kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmapratisaṃvidi caran dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī samudāgacchatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ?
S04n509:2: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī nānyatra rūpeṇa bodhiṃ samanupaśyati |
S04n509:9: anyad rūpamanyo rūpasvabhāva iti naivaṃ paśyati |
S04n509:11: yaśca rūpasvabhāvo yaśca tathāgata ityadvayeyaṃ dharmatā |
S04n509:13: evaṃ nānyatra vedanāyā nānyatra saṃjñāyā nānyatra saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānena bodhiṃ samanupaśyati |
S04n509:22: yaśca vijñānasvabhāvo yaśca tathāgata ityadvayeyaṃ dharmatā |
S04n509:24: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04n509:25: rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam |
S04n509:27: śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ |
S04n509:28: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ nāsya labhyate || 2 ||
S04n509:30: labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate || 3 ||
S04n509:33: nirvāṇaṃ nirvṛtī vuttā nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate |
S04n509:37: paśyitvā kāyu buddhasya vakṣyante dṛṣṭu nāyakaḥ |
S04n509:38: na cāhaṃ rūpakāyena paśyituṃ śakya kenacit || 7 ||
S04n509:41: evaṃ pañcāna skandhānāṃ jñānaṃ me dharmalakṣaṇam |
S04n509:44: na ca dharmata buddhānāṃ śakyaṃ vācāya bhāṣitum || 10 ||
S04n509:50: na cānyā śūnyatā uktā anyā rūpasvabhāvatā |
S04n509:51: yastu rūpaṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti śunyatām || 13 ||
S04n509:54: prajānāti hi yo rūpaṃ sa prajānāti śūnyatām |
S04n509:55: ya śūnyatāṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti nirvṛtim || 15 ||
S04n509:73: praviśya ca gṛhāṃsteṣāṃ dūṣayiṣyanti tān kulān || 24 ||
S04n509:79: yathā te pravrajitvā hi paradāreṣu mūrcchitāḥ || 27 ||
S04n509:81: sā śikṣā teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tasmin kāle na bheṣyati || 28 ||
S04n509:83: yā ca sā uttamā pūjā pratipattirna bheṣyati || 29 ||
S04n509:86: śrutvā śīlasya te varṇaṃ duḥśīlāḥ pāpagocarāḥ |
S04n509:88: na ca hrī bheṣyate teṣāṃ naṣṭaṃ śrāmaṇakaṃ dhanam |
S04n509:92: na me śrutaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ vā yeṣāmetādṛśī carī |
S04n509:94: yā teṣāṃ kuhanā tatra śāṭhiyaṃ vākkiyaṃ tadā |
S04n509:95: jānāmi tadahaṃ sarvaṃ jñānaṃ me'tra pravartate || 35 ||
S04n509:96: sacet kalpaṃ prabhāṣeyaṃ yatteṣāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu |
S04n509:99: mā tehi saṃstavaṃ sārdhaṃ kuryāstvaṃ kāli paścime || 37 ||
S04n509:103: kuryā hi gauravaṃ tatra śirasā pādavandanam || 39 ||
S04n509:105: pratighātaṃ na janayet maitracittaḥ sadā bhavet || 40 ||
S04n509:107: yādṛśaṃ kāhitī karma lapsyate tādṛśaṃ phalam || 41 ||
S04n509:111: evaṃ cittaṃ pradadhyāstvaṃ sarve bheṣyanti nāyakāḥ || 43 ||
S04n509:114: evaṃ tvaṃ vāca bhāṣeyyā āyuṣmān vijña paṇḍitaḥ |
S04n509:115: kathaṃ mahātmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā || 45 ||
S04n509:116: sahasaiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā ca bhājanam |
S04n509:119: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣestvāṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ || 47 ||
S04n509:121: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām || 48 ||
S04n509:122: parīttā yadi pāpecchā śīlavanto bahū bhavet |
S04n509:124: pūrvaṃ pariṣadaṃ jñātvā yadi śuddhā bhavettadā |
S04n509:126: dānaṃ śīlaṃ tathā kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ śrutaṃ tathā |
S04n509:129: eteṣāṃ varṇa bhāṣeta evaṃ hi dhārayet sukham || 52 ||
S04n509:148: yena ārāgitaḥ śāstā cittaṃ bodhāya nāmitam |
S04n509:149: mā cala tvaṃ pratijñāyāstiṣṭha ca pratipattiṣu || 62 ||
S04n509:150: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ kṣayakāle upasthite |
S04n509:151: pratibhānaṃ labhet kṣipraṃ pravṛttaṃ yadi dhārayet || 63 ||
S04n509:153: kiṃ vā punaḥ sarvasūtraṃ dhārayed yaḥ śrutārthikaḥ || 64 ||
S04n509:156: itaḥ samādhito yaśca gāthāmekāṃ pi dhārayet |
S04n509:157: sarvaṃ purimakaṃ puṇyaṃ kalāṃ nopaiti ṣoḍaśīm || 66 ||
S04n509:159: imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutveha yaḥ kāṅkṣāṃ na kariṣyati || 67 ||
